title: i cant even open client
body: i cant open client. it pops up and stay there nothing more, is this from me or from riot games?

replies.body: This is likely a permissions setting that's changed and blocking the patcher from launching.  Try the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help open it up!
